    • Method Detail

      • getEm

        public javax.persistence.EntityManager getEm()
        Returns:
        The entity manager from the constructor. It is used to close the connection when the servlet finishes.

      • getLang

        public java.lang.String getLang()
        Returns:
        Return the lang of the user.
        If the user has no lang configured it will return the templang
        templang comes from a cookie or from the settings of the web expleror default lang is english if it is different from spanish, english or french
